item.title: Arena2R
item.description: Arena2R is an R package for Arena Simulation users. Arena Simulation is a great discrete event simulation software, but it lacks neat plots and data reporting tools. After spending a considerable ammount of time struggling with arena output files, I’ve decided to write a few functions, which evolved into this package. You can use the package either via it’s accompanying app, or build your own R script and work from there.
